content:
1. AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) User Guide: This guide provides detailed information on creating and managing IAM users and policies in AWS.
2. AWS IAM Policy Reference: This reference provides a comprehensive list of all the actions and resources that can be controlled through IAM policies.
3. AWS IAM Best Practices: This document provides best practices for using IAM to secure your AWS resources.
4. AWS IAM Troubleshooting Guide: This guide provides information on troubleshooting common IAM issues, such as resolving permissions issues and resolving issues with IAM policies.
5. AWS IAM FAQs: This page provides answers to frequently asked questions about IAM.

You can find all these documentation on the official website: <https://aws.amazon.com/documentation/iam/>
